settings.question: Is PZAZ recyclable?
settings.answer:
We package our Energy Mist in a bottle made with previously recycled plastic.

We designed Pzaz to be easily and realistically recycled in New York City.

Every tiny bottle lasts much longer and uses much less energy to produce, transport, and recycle than an equivalent number of energy drinks.

settings.question: Don‚Äôt u know some people are still gonna litter this? üò¢

That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve chosen to become Plastic Negative‚Ñ¢ certified:¬†Every purchase of Pzaz directly funds the removal and proper recycling of 200% of our environmental impact.

settings.question: Wait so using PZAZ actually leaves the earth with less plastic?

We are the only energy product certified Plastic Negative‚Ñ¢.

For every tube of Pzaz sold, two tubes worth of plastic litter are removed from the earth.

settings.question: How exactly does ur plastic negative partnership work?
settings.answer:
(1) U buy Pzaz

(2) We direct a portion of that money to¬†Repurpose Global

(3) RePurpose Global contracts waste management workers around the world to remove and properly recycle all sorts of plastic that would otherwise be deemed ‚Äúunrecoverable waste.‚Äù¬†

settings.question: How much plastic litter have u already removed from the earth?
settings.answer:
We‚Äôve barely launched, but ur support has already helped us remove more than 700 pounds of plastic litter from waterways and urban landfills around the world.

That‚Äôs the equivalent of more than 20,000 littered energy drink bottles or more than 35,000 candy bar wrappers.

In the process, you‚Äôve helped us provide waste management workers around the world with living wages and an environmentally ethical job.

settings.question: HOW DO I CANCEL MY ZAZ-O-MATIC SUBSCRIPTION
settings.answer:
HAVE FUN SNOOZING üò¢

To update or cancel your zaz-o-matic subscriptions, simply check your email for any order confirmation messages.

1) In any order confirmation email, tap on "MANAGE ORDER" to go to view your account.

2) Tap on "MANAGE ZAZOMATIC" and we'll email you a one-time, super-secure link where you can update or indefinitely pause your zaz-o-matic.
